prompts: Create a fighting-type Pokemon that is agile and has a playful demeanor.
I want a blue Pokemon with sharp claws and a determined look on its face.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that looks ready to take on any challenge with its fierce gaze.
Make a small, energetic Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and loves to train.
Imagine a Pokemon that can sense the emotions of others and uses that in battles.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its quick reflexes and powerful punches.
Give me a cute but tough-looking Pokemon that has a strong bond with its trainer.
